```
initContainers:
- image: k8spatterns/config-dev:1
  name: init
  args:
  - "/config"
  volumeMounts:
  - mountPath: "/config"
    name: config-directory
containers:
- image: k8spatterns/demo:1
  name: demo
  ports:
  - containerPort: 8080
    name: http
    protocol: TCP
  volumeMounts:
  - mountPath: "/var/config"
    name: config-directory
volumes:
  - name: config-directory
    emptyDir: {}
```
